fonts.name: Poppins
fonts.text: A modern sans-serif font with a geometric style, suitable for headings and body text.

fonts.name: Roboto
fonts.text: A versatile sans-serif font with a clean and professional look, ideal for various design projects.

fonts.name: Lora
fonts.text: A classic serif font with a touch of modernity, perfect for elegant and readable text.

fonts.name: Montserrat
fonts.text: A bold and contemporary sans-serif font, great for headlines and impactful text.

fonts.name: Open Sans
fonts.text: A clean and friendly sans-serif font, widely used for web and mobile interfaces.

fonts.name: Merriweather
fonts.text: A highly readable serif font, designed for comfortable reading on screens.

fonts.name: Nunito
fonts.text: A rounded sans-serif font with a friendly appearance, suitable for various design contexts.

fonts.name: Raleway
fonts.text: An elegant sans-serif font with a clean and modern look, ideal for headings and display text.

fonts.name: Source Sans Pro
fonts.text: A highly legible sans-serif font, designed for user interfaces and digital content.

color_schemes.name: Ocean Breeze
color_schemes.text: A refreshing color scheme inspired by the ocean, featuring cool blues and aquas.

color_schemes.name: Sunset Glow
color_schemes.text: A warm and vibrant color scheme inspired by sunsets, with fiery oranges and golden yellows.

color_schemes.name: Forest Hues
color_schemes.text: A natural color scheme inspired by forests, featuring rich greens and earthy tones.

color_schemes.name: Urban Chic
color_schemes.text: A modern and sophisticated color scheme inspired by urban environments, with sleek darks and bold accents.

color_schemes.name: Pastel Dreams
color_schemes.text: A soft and dreamy color scheme featuring gentle pastels and calming hues.

color_schemes.name: Desert Mirage
color_schemes.text: A warm and earthy color scheme inspired by desert landscapes, blending sandy browns with soft, sun-washed tones.

icons.name: Font Awesome
icons.text: A popular icon library offering a wide range of scalable vector icons for web projects. Used for this website.

icons.name: Material Icons
icons.text: Google's Material Design icon set, providing clean and modern icons for various applications.

icons.name: Ionicons
icons.text: A set of premium icons designed for use in web, mobile, and desktop applications.

icons.name: Feather Icons
icons.text: A collection of simple and elegant open-source icons, perfect for minimalist designs.

icons.name: Boxicons
icons.text: A simple and customizable icon library with a variety of styles and categories.

images.name: Unsplash
images.text: A vast collection of high-quality, royalty-free images contributed by photographers worldwide.

images.name: Pexels
images.text: A popular platform offering free stock photos and videos for personal and commercial use.

images.name: Pixabay
images.text: A comprehensive resource for free images, illustrations, vectors, and videos.

images.name: StockSnap.io
images.text: A curated collection of beautiful free stock photos with high resolution and diverse categories.

images.name: Burst by Shopify
images.text: A free stock photo platform powered by Shopify, offering images tailored for entrepreneurs.
